summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2101, for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from West 70th Street to West 75th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21195 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
